branchCategory.name: Valves (All Types)
branchCategory.description: <p>S0700 valve is available as base mounted for manifold mounting or as body ported.</p>

branchItem.name: S0700, 5 Port Solenoid Valve, Base Mounted
branchItem.description: <p>S0700 valve for base mounting.  Available as plug-in stacking base, plug-in slim compact bar base, and plug-lead manifold base.</p>

branchItem.name: S0700, 5 Port Solenoid Valve, Body Ported
branchItem.description: <p>S0700 valve with body porting.  It is available as stand alone valve or in manifold base.</p>
